name: DIGITAL HYPERSPACE RETROGRADE (Madvent Build)
description:
A short game made for the HauntedPS1 Madvent calendar WASD to move Space to jump

Alone again on the holidays

Everything is fuzzy

A voice calls to you

Telling you to 

SOAR SOAR TO HIGHER PASTURES ... ... SUCH IS THE WAY IN THE HYPERBOLIC DIGITAL HYPERSPACE RETROGRADE

Warnings for Eyestrain, flashing lights, loud noises 

Music by DemiCharDev
